class_notes:
(Same as POLS 358 1)
(This class will address selected aspects of American constitutional, judicial and statutory law that have a particular impact on women and gender minorities. Topics may include legal guarantees of race and gender equality, employment discrimination, affirmative action, same-sex marriage, and abortion and reproductive rights. We will survey the relationship between gender and the law, and examine how gendered subjects have been defined as legal subjects over time.)
course_description: Comprehensive analysis of legal issues relevant to women's status in society. Constitutional and statutory law addressed.
